mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.user_id, b.hit, b.title, b.date, b.contents, b.category, b.sympathy, u.name, u.grade FROM boards AS b JOIN users AS u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE category = 'notice' ORDER BY date DESC

SELECT b.id AS b_id, b.user_id, b.hit, b.title, b.date, b.contents, b.category, b.sympathy, u.name, u.photo FROM boards AS b JOIN users AS u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE category = 'notice' AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
SELECT b.id, b.user_id, b.hit, b.title, b.date, b.contents, b.category, b.sympathy, u.name, u.grade FROM boards AS b JOIN users AS u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE b.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boards (category, title, user_id, date, contents) VALUES ('notice',#{title},#{user_id},now(),#{contents})
